thread.title: A safe bet for an impromptu business stay
thread.title_full: A safe bet for an impromptu business stay - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Steve H
title: A safe bet for an impromptu business stay
text:
Impromptu business trip to London resulting in arriving here after a long day at 12.30am. The 24 hour bar was open, there was relaxing music playing in the foyer, really comfy chairs & friendly attentive staff.
The room was clean & in perfectly acceptable condition for Â£180 a night. The bed comfy, although no air con in the room & the window opened only 2 inches - would be hot in Summer.
Not yet had breakfast, but so far the hotel beats any Premier Inn or Travelodge I've stayed at.
Also not far from Euston & the British Museum - might stay here for a couple of days with the kids in Summer hols.
